titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Ernest B. Drake papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.altformavail: Photocopies and typescripts of original diaries and letters also available.

archdesc.bioghist: Student at the University of Michigan, engineering class of 1914, later first lieutenant in the field artillery during World War I.
archdesc.scopecontent: Diary, 1913, describing activities as U-M undergraduate; diaries and letters, 1917-1918, relating to wartime service in America and in France; other documents and photographs relating to education, to military service, and to his career as a teacher.
